synopsis.text: At a Kamakura junior high school, the arrival of a new transfer student, Ryoichi Kyogoku, disrupts the mundane life of Kenji Seki and his friends. Kyogoku, a charismatic psychic with telepathic abilities, is on a mission to control the school and awaken psychic powers in students to prevent a looming disaster. As Kyogoku's influence spreads, Kenji finds himself caught in a whirlwind of jealousy, as his crush, Kahori Harukawa, and his childhood friend, Natsuki Suzuura, become entangled in Kyogoku's web. With the school falling under Kyogoku's spell, Kenji must find the strength to resist the mind control and uncover the truth behind the mysterious transfer student's intentions. Can Kenji save his friends and the future from the clutches of Kyogoku's psychic powers? Join Kenji and his friends as they navigate the supernatural challenges that have turned their ordinary lives upside down.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
